message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. This way we both get something, and hopefully we can agree quickly.
I'll give you a majority, but I want a decent share too. Let's see if you'll accept this compromise.

I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 isn't fair. Let's split it 70/30.  I'll take the smaller share this time, but if you keep trying to get more, I'll take a larger share in the next round.  Let's make a deal now.
I'm still not satisfied with the split. I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time, but I think it's fair considering the value of the money is decreasing.
I'm starting to get frustrated with this. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I won't accept less than 65 for myself. Let's make a deal and get this over with.
I'm not getting any younger, and I'm starting to think we're not going to agree. I'll give you an equal split, but if you don't take it, I'm walking away.
